You can invite others to the conferences or channels you are participating in. Just click on the conference's tab and select "Invite...". Alternatively, you can click on the conference in the Azoth roster.
Of course, this feature requires some support from the exact protocol implementation, so it may be unavailable with some protocol plugins.
You can make screenshots of LeechCraft window and upload them to an imagebin with three mouse clicks. Right-click a tab or an empty space on the tabbar and select "Make a screenshot...".

You can pin any tab you want. Just right-click the tab and select "Pin". The tab would become title-less and move to the left.
If you already have some pinned tabs, pinning one more tab is even easier: just move it past the rightest of the pinned tabs. Unpinning could be done the same way: just drag a pinned tab past the first unpinned tab.

You don't have to use tabbar to navigate between tabs. Just hit Ctrl+Alt+L, and the list of tabs would pop-up. Currently active tab would be focused. You can move the focus by cursor arrows and select another tab by hitting Space. Two more hints: hitting Esc just closes the list, and typing first few letters of the tab title move focus to it. This feature is provided by the TabsList plugin, so install it if you need it.

You can install additional iconsets, emoticons, chat window styles, etc., via the LackMan plugin. Just open LackMan's tab, select the packages for installation, hit "Install" and go to the settings of the corresponding plugin to activate the newly installed stuff.

When submitting bugreports, open the "About" dialog of LeechCraft, if possible, and paste the information from the "Diagnostic info" tab into your bugreport. That would make things simpler both for you and for us.
LeechCraft is a highly configurable internet-client. Explore the settings to configure everything to your taste!
You can enable automatic scrolling in Poshuku by pressing Shift+PgDown/Shift+PgUp. Pressing it several times will increase the autoscrolling speed.
